plot: Lisa makes a new friend at school - Harper, who happens to be super-rich, while Homer makes friends with Harper's dad and sets out to continue living the good life when Lisa decides to end the friendship.

Lisa makes a new friend, Harper, whose father is a multi-millionaire and treats the family to priority seats for David Copperfield and the hot new Australian boy band - as well as replacing Homer's homeopathic chair, the old one being destroyed by the citizens who unwittingly crowd-funded it. But Harper is spoilt and demanding of her own way, distressing Lisa, and Homer much choose between the good life and fatherly loyalty.—don @ minifie-1
